website_summaries.verdict: Solid wood construction and an attractive metal frame make this sturdy table a good option.
pros: A decent-sized table with an oak veneer surface, functional drawers, and a lower metal shelf
The design is sturdy and assembly is straightforward
Measures 47.2 inches wide by 16 inches deep by 28 inches high
cons: The oak finish is easily damaged

customer_reviews.title: This table is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful!! My husband wanted it for along a wall that is by his chair. The top piece has most of the weight and the wood is nice and so is the stain on the wood. The metal is beautiful too. We both just love how it looks. It is HEAVY. The box said it weighed 70 lbs. It's not a light weight piece. It didn't take him very long to put it together either. The drawers don't pull out as easily as we'd like but it's okay because it will discourage our younger grandchildren from getting into them. We are more than pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: W. B.

customer_reviews.title: Not easily assembled because the screws aren't long enough
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rate it accurately because I still don't have it assembled. The Head Cap Bolts are not long enough to hold the washers and still fit into the assembly holes of the frame. Planning to get my Dad who is a handyman to help me (probably need to buy other screws at the hardware store). Update: I was FINALLY able to get the console table assembled. The screws provided are quite short and will likely need frequent tightening. I find this to be a design problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love...Beautiful, Solid, Sturdy and a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the piece. It does not look cheap and is definitely sturdy! I bought to add workspace due to working out of the home during the Pandemic. However, I may not get to use the space much since my cat, Lola, thinks the space is now hers! After putting together, I bought the matching filing cabinet! Anxiously awaiting its arrival. If that piece is anything like this one, I will order a second filing cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great table!  Needs better shipping package.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, high quality table and it exceeded my expectations. However, the box was beat up and the base of the table was exposed on arrival. The wooden table top was slightly damaged on one corner. I was sure I wanted to exchange and have to disassemble and reassemble another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra, Pasadena, CA

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice ... heavy
customer_reviews.text: Our table arrived today ... very heavy box. I opened the box as I was concerned if there was any shipping damage ... NOPE .. it was very well packaged, lots of styrofoam, corner protection ... excellent. It was easy to assemble and really looks good. I’m thinking about getting the smaller matching pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Kay

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easily Assembled
customer_reviews.text: The Sofa Table was pretty much exactly what I expected it to be. It is a little heavier than I actually thought it would be, but it is actually well built and looks good when it's assembled. I think the drawers are a little lower quality as they are not on tracks and don't slide quite as well as I thought they would. Overall this table is durable, attractive, and easy to assemble... making it well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition and fills the need for a table in a rather narrow hallway. My only objection, personal taste, is the black color of the iron base. Would have preferred a bronze color, but that only seems to be available in deeper hall tables. I needed the 16" depth! The wooden top look identical to our higher end Mission Oak pieces, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Antique Lover

customer_reviews.title: Really attractive and good quality small sofa table
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased quite a while ago. We wanted a nice decrative piece to place in a guest powder room. This filled the bill perfectly. Very nicely designed, nice materials and doesn't come off as 'cheap' like some K/D products. I found it easy to assemble and it is extremely sturdy - good engineering and everything fit extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: SpringFever

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy attractive furniture
customer_reviews.text: We like this line of furniture. We have 4 various tables now. Arrived in great condition. The packing weighs about the same as table. No dings or scratches. Easily assembled. I also sprayed a few coats of polyurethane on to protect the finish.
customer_reviews.author: El Loco Doggie

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE CHECK ITEMS WHEN THEY HAVE BEEN OBVIOUSLY RETURNED
customer_reviews.text: 0 STARS...Opened the box(taped so much that it was hard to open) and the packing styrofoam was all scratched so we KNOW we were not the first to open. When going into the assembly, noticed a fastener was bent and obviously we tried to bend back it and it broke off. We will not send it back as it is something that can be remedied and it would be a pain in the ass to send back. So now instead of a put together console table we have a pc of furniture sitting and waiting to be worked on. THANKS ALOT
customer_reviews.author: Judi G

customer_reviews.title: Nice table.
customer_reviews.text: This table looks great in my entry way. I was a bit bummed that it arrived with a couple of scuffs in the corners of the top but it would have been a pain to pack up everything and send it back so my husband just covered the scuffs with furniture Polish.
customer_reviews.author: T&V.R.

customer_reviews.title: Holy Moly...
customer_reviews.text: good, solid table for most any use. Matches my entertainment center also... thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Charles T. Jenkinson

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Style
customer_reviews.text: I needed some stylish extra storage space for my very tiny condo. This was perfect for my grandkids' games below and yet let me decorate the top. This was a great purchase and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Haley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive wood!
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive piece of furniture! Easy to assemble and very solid! I always get compliments on it! Very pleased !
customer_reviews.author: Noreen Scully

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS CONSOLE TABLE
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday, setup immdeiately and only took about 30 minutes. Packaged very securely. This console is very well made and absolutely beautiful piece of furniture. We were a bit skeptical since the price was more than reasonable, wondering if it'd be as good as it looks. Well, it definitely is every bit (even better) than it looks on the picture. We are so happy with this purchase! If you are thinking about buying this console.please do..............you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Judee

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love the oak finish matches our other oak furniture very well. Very sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: nicole young

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: It came with a dent on the back Otherwise a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Martin

customer_reviews.title: Really like this, but one corner scuffed up so will ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like this, but one corner scuffed up so will need to use a color blender to fix.using as a keurig stand with coffees in drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice real wood. Looks good put together. Sturdy and nicely made to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Otto

customer_reviews.title: Versatile piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. Easy to put together, lightweight. I have it in the mud room to catch husbands keys, mail, etc...
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: It is safely secured on frame..it just sits on the frame with no screws
customer_reviews.text: All the screws weren't in the box I had to wait 2 weeks for them. Also the hole to attach the top to the frame do not match up so I just have it standing there not secure and can't return it or get a new one or reimbursement would be nice
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Marie ramsey

customer_reviews.title: This is one of 3 Love them... Wish that you had a kitchen or dining ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of 3 Love them... Wish that you had a kitchen or dining room table that matches. Truly thank you Todd
customer_reviews.author: Todd Adams

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: A bit wider than expected but exactly as described. very sturdy. No question it's a quality piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne ercoli

customer_reviews.title: Better than Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Excellent quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Deger

customer_reviews.title: Box came destoyed
customer_reviews.text: Box came destroyed ,holes in steel were not drilled and tapped had to do that my self ?it was cheaper and easier then sending it back for me so I did it .the steel clips were all bent that hold up the table ....heated them up and bent them back!
customer_reviews.author: smoky mcrackin

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This table is a wonderful piece of furniture. It arrived in a very short time and was packaged extremely well. Went together quite easily and is very sturdy and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Celtic Cutie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece, very solid and easy to put together. I was impressed with how solid the wood top is and the way it's packed for shipping. they really do a great job in preventing any damage. Wish it was a little taller. but still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have blonde oak living room furniture and wanted to purchase a sofa table. After several trips into Houston we found none. Then decided to check Amazon and there they were. We are extremely pleased with the quality of this table. It looks country style, only wish I had bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS QUALITY !!!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together. !!! FABULOUS QUALITY !! I’ve returned 3 before this from other companies. This by far is high quality. Real wood. Metal base. Super impressed !!!
customer_reviews.author: lisa bowser

customer_reviews.title: Be ready for touch up on black pieces
customer_reviews.text: Some of the black finish is rubbed off on all pieces. All in all pretty but be ready to do touch up on black slats
customer_reviews.author: Allison Wellman

customer_reviews.title: Simple to put together
customer_reviews.text: Wish there were a couple more choices of stain color
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entry table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! It’s just what we needed! We’re using the table as an entry way table and also shoes go on the metal rack! It’s a little wobbly but with the wall mount it stays put. It was very well packed and nothing was damaged thankfully!!
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Amazing table
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome!!! Took me 20 minutes to assemble by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table. I don't have time to run to different stores looking for a sofa table so it's Amazon for me. Got this table and the end table and coffee table to replace my old out of date tables and love them all
customer_reviews.author: Shannon D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly satisfied with this.  Delivered fast.  No problems.  Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking table. Drawers work good. Sturdy. Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Struck

customer_reviews.title: Furniture Store quality at thrift shop price!
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional quality and for the price can't be beat! With that being said...like any piece of 'Assembly Required' furniture the end result is byproduct of the assembler. Could not have been packaged better! In fact, that's the only downside I found (and trust me, I was looking:). Took longer to unpack than to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Livinez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table
customer_reviews.text: We’re using this as a printer table in my office. Easy to assemble with instructions. Drawers fit perfectly and slide easily. Very sturdy and even great looking. Glad we chose this one!
customer_reviews.author: LIN B

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, worth the money. Watch out when removing the drawers - you have to reach in above the inside of the drawer and pull down the stiff plastic safety strip to remove the it all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Al D

customer_reviews.title: Home Style 5050-22 Modern Craftsman Sofa Distressed Oak Finish
customer_reviews.text: Just like the end tables purchased with this sofa table, my wife didn't like the holes drilled in the finish. Was easy to put togeather. Maybe took 20min. Looks great in the room with our oak fireplace and mantle, and the matching end tables. is a very heavy table. Maybe a bit to narrow on the base. at first it seemed like it was going to tip over. But not
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected! Looks great in entryway. Fairly easy to assemble, heavy packaging. Would buy again and recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: connie ellis

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived quickly and I put it together by myself in no time at all. It is positively beautiful in my dining room. It is sturdy and has a great old-world appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Lady

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sofa table. It's sturdy and was easy to put assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece of furniture. Packed well to prevent shipping damage. Easy to assemble. Very sturdy, made of real wood not particle board. One con is one of the drawers is so tight it is very hard to open. It looks like it can be fixed by trimming or sanding the right spots to make operation easier.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Well built and easy to assemble. Very happy with purchase! Great price
customer_reviews.author: Michele Renz

customer_reviews.title: Looks terrific up against my leather sofa!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, sturdy table with a high-end look. Overall, assembly was easy, but the wood screws that attach the top to the base definitely require a drill. Take note. Other than that, a marvelous find!
customer_reviews.author: donnacooksalot

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Console with drawers.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Console. Was exactly as described. Easy installation. Definitely Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Recommends

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - Well Made Sofa Table
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my friend - first item arrived damaged, but Amazon quickly replaced the damaged item. This Sofa Table is beautiful - well made, and just looks awesome! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawniel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Easy to Put Together
customer_reviews.text: I am always a little nervous when I order something for my home that needs to be put together. But this item went together like a dream. Very pretty and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MLW

customer_reviews.title: It’s better than we expected!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s better than we expected!! Sturdy & well packed. Had to assemble, but it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and appearance for such a low price.easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good table for the money
customer_reviews.text: No this is not a high end table, but it is heavy, and perfact for what I want it for. I'm very pleased with the table, and it looks great in my house. For the money I don't think I went wrong.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.Texas

customer_reviews.title: The metal legs didn’t match as well as I wish they had
customer_reviews.text: Living room sofa table works well with my furniture. It was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: kim m christensen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking but brackets not placed correctly on frame
customer_reviews.text: Had to modify the brackets for table top did not fit flush on top of the frame. No matter how much the frame is tightened, the table isn't 100% secure and slightly wobbles when moved. I would not recommend this table to folks that don't have a good drill, a lot of patience, and experience installing furniture. I decided to keep it because it is attractive & functional, a fair price, and it's a hassle returning stuff.
customer_reviews.author: SuZ

customer_reviews.title: Sofa Table
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Not hard to put together. Fits perfectly in the area I wanted it to go in. Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: It looks great. Price was good
customer_reviews.text: I am using the sofa table for a tv stand. It looks great. Price was good. I gave it 4 stars because one of the drawers is hard to open and close. But, all in all, very pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jan of CA

customer_reviews.title: It is excellent quality and extremely well made
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are true on this table! It is excellent quality and extremely well made! I have seen similar tables for 3 times this price. This looks perfect in my dining room! Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deagle

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sofa table. It fits out front hall perfectly. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lauss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. It's just the right size and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: rlmcme

customer_reviews.title: sofa table
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this table was fantastic. Easy to assemble and sturdy. I liked it so much I actually returned and bought another. The wood is good and the drawers work fine. The railing on the bottom was also sturdy. This is a real piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Petit

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful table
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful oak table. It is perfect for my needs. Couldn't be happier!!! Buy one and find out!
customer_reviews.author: Spacbrat

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Was not hard to assemble. However you will need two people because the box is very heavy. Product picture is very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: camanogal

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My table had a chip on the front, but I chose not to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This sofa table is beautiful and the perfect size! My husband put it together by himself fairly easily (my son helped with one step). I've done business with Wayfair before, and the delivery was extremely fast once again and we very pleased with the product!
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Exceeded my expectations. For the money this is an excellent buy. Very easy to put together. Definitely would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love this coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee table. Love the drawers and that it is heavy. The lighter tables slide around too easy on wood floors.The color is perfect and was easy to put together. Shipping was quick!!
customer_reviews.author: janet akerberg

customer_reviews.title: ... receiving a second table because of damages- it's a nice table very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: After returning and receiving a second table because of damages- it's a nice table very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This was very well packaged and easily to put together by me and my husband. I placed it in our bedroom at the entrance where the door opens. Every time my husband looks at it he says "that looks really nice honey", you did a good job choosing it. I put 3 square fabric baskets (which match the bedroom scheme ) on the bottom shelf to hold odds & ends. Looks great. It use to be a catch-all area.
customer_reviews.author: SteelerLover

customer_reviews.title: Sofa Table
customer_reviews.text: Everything I hoped it to be. Matches beautiful with the furniture I already have. A great fit to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Akas

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning!
customer_reviews.text: This piece of furniture gave the finishing touches to our rustic living room. It's right by the entrance and everyone that sees it comments on it. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Fairest.One

customer_reviews.title: sofa table
customer_reviews.text: All I got to say is Wow what a beautiful product. craftsmanship is great. Looks great easy to assemble (legs & bracing) Would recommend this product and manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality and it was very easy to assemble. Need someone strong around to flip it over. Wood finish is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Lived up to expectation
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Attractive and sturdy. Directions for assembly could be made more clear. While wood screws need no predrilled holes it would be helpful to have a marker where the holes should go. Happy with this table.
customer_reviews.author: est

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This table looks great in my dining room. Easy to assemble. Box is very heavy
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and it looks great. I like the way it matches our hardwood floor and the metal easily coordinates with anything wrought iron. We bought bar stools to match. There are zillions of lights and chairs of similar style that work with this to make a room look great.
customer_reviews.author: E. B. Allred

customer_reviews.title: Versatile piece
customer_reviews.text: Good quality piece used in our guest bedroom. It was easy to assemble and is sturdy,useful,and attractive. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: John Higgins

customer_reviews.title: great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This table arrives with easy assembly and looks just as it is described and pictured. accents a sofa or living area perfectly. Great piece of furniture for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Terri McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Overall, not much to complain about.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and quality was above average for the price. Did have to lubricate the drawer slides as they were hard to open initially.
customer_reviews.author: nanronp

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this item with the exception of scratched marks on the bottom shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Cleary-Barcomb

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but the box was damaged when we got it
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but the box was damaged when we got it. Trucking guy was a jerk. We took it and couldn't see damage until we were just about done putting it together. Top had a dent and a scratch. Don't believe I will buy furniture through Amazon again. Upsetting I paid full price for this!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this item since I have had some disappointments with online furniture purchases in the past. However, I am extremely pleased with this table. It arrived in excellent condition; easy to assemble; fit my space perfectly. Looks great and much more expensive than the actual price. Have received many compliments on it in the two months since we purchased it. All in all, a very good buy. Amazon never disappoints!
customer_reviews.author: Sun Prairie Denizen

customer_reviews.title: The furniture came damaged. After I put it together ...
customer_reviews.text: The furniture came damaged. After I put it together noticed the top piece was damaged. Unfortunately, there was no one to contact about this problem.
customer_reviews.author: jen hartinger

customer_reviews.title: At first the look. Then how well it's made
customer_reviews.text: Just the right thing. It is better than I had hoped. Amazing construction
customer_reviews.author: anenna

product_meta.title: Modern Craftsman Distressed Oak Sofa Table by Home Styles
product_meta.description: Reminiscent of the American craftsman era with understated style and simplicity. Traditional modern craftsman sofa table is constructed by poplar solids and oak veneers. This comes with distressed oak finish with brown metal accents. The modern craftsman sofa table offers two storage drawers and an open storage shelf. Easy to assemble. Measures 47-1/4-inch width by 16-inch depth by 28-inch height.
feature_bullets: Made of poplar solids and oak veneers
Features two storage drawers and an open storage shelf
Comes with distressed oak finish with brown metal accents
Measures 47-1/4-inch width by 16-inch depth by 28-inch height

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars146 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
